name: LOCKWISE
description:
Inspired by "Rock, Paper, Scissors" LOCKWISE is a conventional and symbolic maze. Simply swap shapes to create new paths...

but don't get stuck.

While this is one of the more gamey games here, it's also an experiment in taking a zero-sum game "Rock, Paper, Scissors" and making a non-zero-sum meta-game from it.  The mechanic appealed to me as the power relationship between the pieces is circular.

Rock beats scissors, scissors beats paper, paper beats rock
BECOMES
Circles eat triangles, triangles eat squares, squares eat circles

It is through exchanges between the pieces that the game is won.
